detail_desc: Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and slim legs with ribbed hems.
Top in soft, printed jersey with short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Knee-length lace dress with short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Shimmering metallic imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, scalloped edges at the top and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, adjustable straps with metal buckles at the front, and loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyurethane content of the skirt is water-based and free from DMF.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Short velvet dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long sleeves.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a low, roll-edge neckline and roll edges around the sleeves.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a drawstring hood and stand-up collar with a press-stud. Zip and button band with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 6/7/8 PLUS/X. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.

Warm-lined hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles. Height of soles 2 cm.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Cut-out section at the back and a slit at the back of the hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Joggers in washed, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with seams at the knees.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Medium-coverage underwired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a romper suit and sun hat in airy, patterned organic cotton poplin. Romper suit with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hems and narrow shoulder straps. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y). Double-layered sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4 cm.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a low neckline and decorative, covered buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Tape-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Sarong in a softly draping weave with ties at the top and a small hole to thread the tie through after winding it around the waist. Flounced trims.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a wide, foldover hem.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, and detachable belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.
Top in supersoft viscose jersey with a print motif and sequins on the front, short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Round-necked top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short puff sleeves and a text print on the front.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Nepped jumper in soft, fine-knit linen with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Large earrings with fabric appliqués. Round pendants with flower-shaped metal decorations and fabric details. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm, length approx. 7 cm.

Short, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim, 3/4-length legs with slits at the hems.
Top in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Knee-length dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short dolman sleeves. Lined.

Two-button jacket in a stretch wool blend with narrow notch lapels, an open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs, the longest with a coin-shaped pendant and the shorter chains decorated with small metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Vest top in airy slub jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved sports top in sturdy cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a flared, tiered skirt.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in marled sweatshirt fabric with embroidered appliqués and a lined hood. Zip down the front, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the sides, cuffs and hem.
Velvet loafers with fabric tassels at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Jumper in a rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and a tongue with an appliqué on the front. Elasticated lacing and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.

Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, fake chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Cardigan in a loose bouclé knit with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and front patch pockets. No buttons.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in sturdy cotton twill with a collar with an adjustable storm tab and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Shoulder tabs with a decorative button, a loose yoke front and back, side pockets and two inner pockets. Adjustable belt with a buckle at the waist, and a high single back vent with a concealed fastening. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, zip at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Calf-length dress in an airy rib knit with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and long, wide sleeves with closely-fitting ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
